description:
Torii Eriko is http://anidb.net/ch1201 [Hasekura Rei]`s grande sœur and the most respected member of the Yamayurikai. Eriko is very gifted and good at almost everything, although she is also enigmatic and eccentric. She has a large forehead, which http://anidb.net/ch1196 [Sei] made fun of when they were young, and began their rivalry. She said once that she chose Rei as her sœur to see if anything interesting would happen.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Torii Eriko
